trends: There have been no other sightings in Cordova
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: orange/red small circular light would pulse to bigger round orange light
divs: sighting detailsi was attending the drag races at cordova ill. i happened to look up and directly overhead i observed a orange\red small circular light that would pulse to a bigger round orange light. i watched it move at a speed i would compare to a slow moving helicopter. i kept trying to find other identifying lights, but saw none. it traveled south with a continuous pulse, turned slightly to the west and then south again. not much farther it pulsed bright and disappeared. i pointed it out to person by me and they just said ufo. i did make an attempt at a photo and wasn't going to report until i saw the ill video posted for aug 17. it looked similar to what i observed. i included the picture as taken, not zoomed or enhanced. its just a small orange dot, but you can zoom in on it.
